mapper.sql:
SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.EXAM_SN , A.EXAM_QSTN_SN , A.QSTN_NO , A.TITLE , A.SUB_NO , A.QSTN_TYPE , (SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('EXAM_QSTN_TYPE', A.QSTN_TYPE)) AS QSTN_TYPE_NM , A.QSTN_CTS , A.EMPL_1 , A.EMPL_2 , A.EMPL_3 , A.EMPL_4 , A.EMPL_5 , A.RGT_ANSR , A.MULTI_RGT_ANSR , A.QSTN_EXPL , A.QSTN_SCORE , A.EDITOR_YN , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO)) AS MOD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO)) AS REG_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_qstn WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND EXAM_SN = A.EXAM_SN AND QSTN_NO = A.QSTN_NO) AS QSTN_CNT
, (select count(1) from tb_std_std aa, tb_usr_user_info bb, tb_usr_login cc, tb_lec_exam_stare dd where aa.user_no = bb.user_no and bb.user_no = cc.user_no and aa.std_no = dd.std_no and aa.crs_cre_cd = dd.crs_cre_cd and aa.enrl_sts IN ('S','C','F') and cc.user_sts = 'U' and dd.EXAM_SN = A.EXAM_SN AND dd.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD
AND NVL((dd.STARE_CNT),0) > 0 and NVL((dd.end_dttm),'') != ''
and dd.QSTN_NOS LIKE CONCAT('%@#', A.EXAM_QSTN_SN, '@#%') ) as STARE_CNT
FROM tb_lec_exam_qstn A WHERE A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND A.EXAM_SN = #{examSn}
mapper.select:
AND #{strExamQstnSn} LIKE CONCAT('%@#', EXAM_QSTN_SN, '@#%')
AND QSTN_TYPE IN ('K', 'S')
AND QSTN_TYPE = 'D'
AND QSTN_TYPE = 'J'
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{examSetCnt}
